project_name: TODO2 Universal Agent Task Execution System

g1.title: Advanced Template Engine & Variable System
g1.description: Build sophisticated template engine with advanced variable substitution, conditional logic, inheritance patterns, and validation system supporting 15+ programming languages and frameworks
g1.notes: Must include real template parsing, variable validation, conditional rendering, and multi-language syntax support

g2.title: Multi-Language Agent Generator Suite
g2.description: Implement comprehensive agent generators for Go, C#, Python, TypeScript, Rust, Java, Node.js, PHP, Ruby, Swift, Kotlin, Scala, Elixir, Haskell, and Clojure with language-specific optimizations
g2.notes: Real language-specific templates, syntax validation, framework integration, and performance optimizations

g3.title: Universal Agent Monitoring & Analytics Dashboard
g3.description: Build comprehensive monitoring system with real-time agent status tracking, performance metrics visualization, completion analytics, and automated reporting across all deployed agents
g3.notes: Real-time dashboards, performance tracking, completion analytics, and automated reporting

g4.title: Enterprise Integration & Deployment Pipeline
g4.description: Implement enterprise-grade integration with CI/CD systems, cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP), container orchestration (Kubernetes, Docker), and automated deployment workflows
g4.notes: Real cloud platform integration, container orchestration, and automated deployment workflows

g5.title: Universal Agent Testing & Quality Assurance Framework
g5.description: Create comprehensive testing framework for universal agent system with automated validation, performance benchmarking, security scanning, and quality gates enforcement
g5.notes: Automated testing, performance benchmarking, security validation, and quality enforcement

technical_requirements.language_specific_safety: Multi-threading safety with proper synchronization and resource management across all supported languages
technical_requirements.resource_management: Universal resource pooling, memory management, and cleanup patterns for all language ecosystems
technical_requirements.resilience_patterns: Circuit breakers, retry policies, graceful degradation, and fault tolerance across all platforms
technical_requirements.security_standards: Multi-language security validation, input sanitization, authentication, and authorization patterns
technical_requirements.logging_framework: Universal structured logging with correlation IDs and multi-language support
technical_requirements.configuration_pattern: Cross-platform configuration management with validation and environment-specific settings
